page.title: 15POPULATION
page.content:
There are{126 people}who live in this area. Of these{42}are{men}above the age of 16,{39 women, 28 boys}and{17 {girls. There are{35 families}and thus the {average family size}is{3.5. Of the{45 children 26}attend the local primary school at{Easterfield}and{7}go to{Turriff Academy,}which is 6 miles from here. Since{June 1985 4 babies}have been born. The majority of the families are young or middle age Only {6 people }are {over 65. }
The{population density}of this area is {10.5 people per sq.km.}
